channel.title: EP Cover Artwork
channel.description:
Basically my bro's band are shortly releasing their EP soon and I thought, instead of using their artwork atm, maybe you guys could make a better one.
There are 2 possible names for the EP: - Chill, kick back and Relax - Shotgun Bang!
The bands name is kids from the summer and they are a pop/punk band. He dont know im doing this so :P I was thinking something on the lines of:
[img]http://www.drivenfaroff.com/wp-content/2009/05/all_time_low-nothing_personal.jpg[/img]
or
[img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_4KQsaU5dkho/S0cclBNrmMI/AAAAAAAAD1A/ZOQ8lTLiVUA/s400/01AwcamQADebEAVOsBAAAABbOk5U4+.jpg[/img]
The size that we would like to use would be on the lines of
[img]http://www.danavideomedia.com/images/Panel%20CD%20insert.jpg[/img]
